extendedInfo.description: Introducing the P and F Soundboard.  Phineas and Ferb Sounds and songs from the TV show.  In this version you get a combination of 25 songs and sayings from the Hit TV show (all Seasons).  Many of the favorites are there including "whatcha Doooin"  and pery's noise.  Songs include Gitchi Gitchi Goo, squirrels in my Pants and others. Great for fans of all ages! NOTE: YOU CAN NOT SAVE AS RINGTONE/NOTIFICATION IN THIS VERSION! Get "P and F soundboard +"  for that feature more songs and NO ADS! These sounds are DOWNLOADED to your phone so you wont have issues with Lag that some some apps have when they stream the sounds to your phone!PLEASE MAKE SURE YOUR MEDIA VOLUME IS TURNED UP!  SOME PEOPLE HAVE HAD ISSUES SAYING NO SOUNDS PLAY AND THIS IS THE ISSUE, ALSO GALAXY S3 USERS MAY NEED TO RESTART THEIR PHONES.DISCLAIMER: The Pictures associated with this app do not belong to the Disney Corporation.  They were obtained legally through 3rd parties.  The sounds you hear in this app are all publicly available for your listening pleasure on You tube.  We were not the ones to Upload them.  We just Provide a Different way for you to listen to them.   This app is not associated with Disney in anyway.This application complies with US Copyright law guidelines of "fair use". If you feel there is a direct copyright or trademark violation that doesn't follow within the "fair use" guidelines, please contact us directly.

reviews.title: For Free...
reviews.comment: This is great. Just need more quotes and songs on both the free and paid versions. But this is one of my favorite shows, so I am enjoying it. This is also one of the best P/F soundboards.
reviews.author: K Mothershed

reviews.title: Good Sounds but...
reviews.comment: Why should we have to pay to use the sounds as notifications? Rip off! Uninstalling!
reviews.author: Michelle Scheftner

reviews.comment: I totAAA lly like this coz I like their songs..

reviews.comment: Great app if you love phineas and ferb

reviews.title: HTC EVO 4G
reviews.comment: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!! Has ALL of my family\'s fave P&P sayings!   Only complaint is you can\'t make any of them ringtones! :-(   Any chance that\'ll change? Please, please, please!!???  :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: How do I ..?
reviews.comment: I love Phineas and Ferb!! How do I get these to save to my phone so I can use them as ringtones? I\'ve tried but it doesn\'t seem to work and I really want to use them as my ringtones.
reviews.author: Heather Williams
